spec_data.Name: perl-IO-Pipely
spec_data.Description:
IO::Pipely provides a couple functions to portably create one- and two-way
pipes and pipe-like socket pairs. It acknowledges and works around known
platform issues so you don't have to.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:25:10 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Portably create pipe() or pipe-like handles, one way or another
